BRIAN H DO

Ux-Focused Software Engineer

Designing and building meaningful web apps. I'm interested in developing with new technologies and intelligent ux. Currently seeking a full-time role.

Philosophy.

I started developing with an interest in design: To work with creative concepts in fun ways. Since then, I've explored other aspects of development: the ones that make an app performant, maintainable, accessible and above all, usable—something users would want to play with not as a 'website,' but just as an app.

I'm most excited for the evolution of the web in this way, and my featured projects reflect that. Making use of design systems, they resemble native apps; my most recent project, Reverie, is an installable pwa with a simple cache worker to resemble native app loading times.

While now very different in some ways, my interests are the same in spirit as when I started: I'm still most excited about the areas of development that provide the most impact, in terms of mission and a meaningful user experience. It just turns out those areas can vary, from front-end to back-end to cutting-edge web standards, frameworks, and libraries. All worth pursuing.
